review: fantastic achievement and true indie classic that everyone should play together with soma it implements narrative frame design called the 4layers but in my opinion does it even better most of narrative beats are presented via actual unique game play and in between them game provides great sense of exploration and mystery with almost perfect pacing cherry on top are ground breaking visuals created by photogrammetry and gorgeous soundtrack

very nice game fun but finding some of the things were freaking annoying  and having to walk all the way back to the map drawing each time come on   edit review for redux  i see you added portals so you can get back to the map quickly awesome   and fixed all the framey freezing issues i could actually run it on max settings amazing   conclusion  needed more lovecraft stuff it was too little of a tease nice story though

the redux version was completely unplayable to me bc of the wildest stuttering ive ever seen the nonredux version was at least playable but the environmental bits are soo drawn out with nothing to do maybe this comes from a time when we were still exploring walking simulators as a genre and looking at pretty scenery was a legitimate gameplay mechanic for people but man is this a drag
detective walking simulator not bad 610
good game  ive definitely played more of the redux version
this game is amazing forgot to review it back in the day when i played it in 2016 buy it

i dont think it holds up for a 20 experience it was mostly walking if i am super generous there is only about 8 puzzles in the whole game each is solved in about 2 minuets or less the visuals are okay but nothing mind blowing the stories within the game are very short and not super memorable its not that its a bad game but i would only charge about 5 for this now and that might still be too much
it wasnt exactly what i expected it to be anyway i still liked it the graphics and music are very beautiful the story didnt bother me but the ending could have been better 710
really lovely story and the way the investigations are done make this game so much fun i enjoyed the whole experience

positive surprise   atmosphere and music is very good also environment and landscape and colors is superb beautiful especially with oled screen so eye candy experience   story is very interesting and game play is good and interesting puzzle style of stuff   story still left me little bit cold after game ending so maybe 710 because of this but still story is very interesting and i recommend to play this if you like this type of adventurestory driven games
beautiful game despite it being 11 years old now great story and really fun clue mechanics
explore a haunting world with a neat little investigation system that spices up the firstperson walking there are some pretty heavy themes and moments so be warned
cool guide simulator game you call a kid gay and the entire family dies lol

really enjoyed this one as i got to live out my fantasy of being a supernatural detective  at first i was a bit uneasy with the lack of guidance from the game the first murder puzzle took me a long time until i realized what exactly the game wanted me to do after that first puzzle though it all went a lot smoother  id love to play another game in this style  reminds me of a more grounded realistic silent hill
this is a very good game it has a great story and good graphics i recomend it

the vanishing of ethan carter is a mesmerizing mystery adventure that captivates players with its breathtaking visuals haunting atmosphere and compelling storytelling its unique gameplay mechanics and emotional depth make it an unforgettable experience a mustplay for fans of narrativedriven games
same sort of review i did for the redux decent game but with more dated graphics

the pace is fine not too slow or too fast its definitely emotionally gripping and keeps your interest the length is kind of short so id only buy this if it was on sale but otherwise a game ill never forget
nice short detective game
not bad
nice game
very unusual and unique game its a walking simulator most of the time but the story is amazing
i enjoyed this one creepy little mystery
a plot twist i never saw coming that slotted in to the story perfectly and left me weeping if you have 15 dollars and 5 hours to kill its definitely worth the play

very beautiful graphics solid gameplay that trusts you to figure it out and a story which unfolds in complexity quite well i think the short horror section was a bit misguided but overall a great game
the walking simulator feeling is very present but the story is really well thought out all the stories and twists are are really mind blowing

this game takes you into a whole new world with its unique atmosphere and ambiance this comes along with the story that is truly captivating which you can follow but has enough twists and turns to keep you on the edge of your seat this game is one you can truly immerse yourself in and feel as if you are part of it too i strongly recommend this game to story game lovers and anyone who wants to give a story game a go
a beautiful looking exploration game with great story good music and mysteries to solve a very unique experience totally worth it
a good walking simulator

very visually appealing both fun and disturbing plotlines

so the game looks good has a pretty cool story and nice soundtrack but the gameplay is absolutely atrocious from the slow run speed to the incredibly annoying pixel hunting it seems like a lot of it was used to make the game longer than 2 hours to beat i havent played redux but they should make the items easier to see in the environment as well as speed up traversal or add shortcuts
short but interesting story looks great on slightly older pc puzzle challenges are okay a little too much walkingrunning all over needed a few unlockable short cut paths
absolute story telling peak
the story of this game its very good like the graphics
a great game i had fun playing this game the story is amazing and immersive my only gripe is that it was too short looking forward to more games from this dev

amazing mystery adventure with supernatural elements its extremely atmospheric the sound design music and the realistic environments are superb both puzzles and exploration are rewarding and make for an incredibly satisfying short adventure

breathtaking visuals interesting story unforgettable soundtrack amazing atmosphere ethan carter is a fantastic mystery game with fun and unique puzzles to solve  the only criticism i have is the length a blind playthrough only takes about 45 hours

beautiful environments and an engaging story that had me on the edge of my seat trying to figure out what was going on and what had happened to ethan and his family i think the mechanic for how crime scenes were reconstructed was very fun to play around with and the music helped set a good atmosphere for the events that played out i still listen to the soundtrack from time to time to have some nice ambience as i go about different tasks
crazy game super interesting story

a short but engrossing walking sim really reminiscent of dear esther theres some light puzzlesolving with a paranormal twist and a surprise stealth section but mostly just a lot of walking environments are beautiful to walk through and stare at but can sometimes feel empty story is interesting and even has a few unexpected twists  would walk again
good
outstanding views and amazing story

beautiful explorer well crafted with great maneuverability and graphics great gameplay with fun puzzles  honestly the horror many people probably wont consider this horror but i have a weak stomach was just too much for me i really liked what i played of it  but the demonic horroresc was a little too much for me personally id absolutely recommend it for anyone who loved the edith finch game but wished it was darker i will absolutely be watching a play through if i find one
great concept and loved the ending
no combat no death just playing the game your own way witout it holding your hand or giving you to obvious clues

i know you did but my story is done and its a fine story   even after all these years and after two playthroughs the vanishing of ethan carter is a beautiful but sad story that has an impact on those who experience the game besides visuals that are still beautiful the voiceacting is really good i enjoyed my second playthrough just as much as the first one  it is still a short game for roundabout 15h but if you are able to grab it at sale go for it if you love pure storydriven games
fun game a little too open world for my liking so i used a guide to tell me where to go next  played on steam deck worked great
its sad but a good mystery story
awesome game
beautiful game
absolutely beautiful visually sad story and beautiful in its way too well written short but haunting game
chilling story beautiful scenes amazing music must be played and in one sitting
the game has an amazing atmosphere i replay it from time to time just for that recomend it with two hands
i play this every year in october just too good of a tale not to share with friends
beautiful scenery but it is hard not always obvious where to go or what to do google is your friend lol ending was emotional would still recommend just for the experience

i played this projected onto the wall in our living room with the entire family gathered around to watch at first it seems like its a bit of weird one because the gameplay goes back and forth between sleuthing to solve gruesome crimes solving increasingly stranger puzzles and lots of walking in between however its all worth it the writing is great the game is beautiful and the pacing is just right  its totally worth it

the vanishing of ethan carter spins a captivating mystery set in the off putting yet beautiful red creek valley with a storyline centered on ethans disappearance the game keeps players engrossed through clever puzzles that unravel the mystery while the ending delivers a satisfying conclusion the ease of overlooking puzzles can denture from the overall experience its a solid 7 out of 10 for those who enjoy a good mystery horror at an easy pace
bugged out multiple times during playing got stuck in detective mode many times
be warned there are very few save points  its possible to play for yhours and then not be able to save your progress  good luck

this is a beautiful walking stimulator as much as i hate walking simmostly is because they either are boring or give me headaches but this one had a nice story background its like playing batman without the combat but with the detective mode on   the environment are breath taking i enjoy every moment when i get to stand still and envy the nature feels good you also get 2 game in this purchase another one is the redux version of this game
